skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Frontend skills include intermediate HTML5 and CSS for design, advanced Angular for dynamic applications, and beginner-level JavaScript and React.js for ongoing learning and application.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Backend expertise spans intermediate FastAPI and Node.jS, Express. Advanced proficiency in RESTful API Design ensures efficient architecture. Database skills include intermediate PostgreSQL, MongoDB experience.

skills.title: Programming Expertise
skills.description: Proficient in object-oriented programming and program structures, with advanced expertise in its concepts and application across various programming languages such as Python and Java.

portfolio.title: Recipe Hub MERN stack project
portfolio.description: Recipe Hub is a comprehensive digital platform designed to facilitate easy management, sharing, and discovery of recipes. It catifies to three distinct roles: Admin, Chef, and General User, each with tailored functionalities and interfaces to enhance their culinary and management experiences.

portfolio.title: Real Estate Management JAVA - Swing Application
portfolio.description: The Real Estate Management System revolutionizes property management through automation and advanced communication, fostering efficiency and transparency. It promises to reshape industry practices, enhancing compliance and streamlining operations.

portfolio.title: IMU controlled quadcopter drone for object detection
portfolio.description: Crafted an innovative IMU-controlled quadcopter, integrating KK 2.1 flight controller and MPU6050 IMU for precise movement. Enhanced with object detection capabilities via RPi camera and TFLite algorithm, delivering real-time data visualization on the remote control system.
